string.text: Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.
Quiero que te encuentres con alguien. Él no es amigo mío, pero podría usar tu ayuda.
Buena suerte, stalker.
Asesinato por Lukash
Lukash tiene un objetivo que necesita eliminar.
Hey, I'm glad you came. Tengo algo que necesito que hagas por mí. Hay un enemigo mutuo nuestro que debe ser eliminado. Él es peligroso. Tómelo de inmediato.
¡Impresionante hermano!
Gracias.Asalto de Libertad a Monolito
Lukash te ha pedido que dirijas Libertad en un asalto contra el monolito.

Las fuerzas monolíticas siguen rompiendo nuestro bloqueo. Quiero llevar la lucha a ellos por una vez. I've recruited an assault squad and want you to lead them in an invasion on Monolith territory. Llevátelos.
Man, you've got a set on you. Gran trabajo.
Buscar Lab X-8
Busque Lab X-8 en las afueras para obtener evidencia de la ocupación de Clear Sky.

He recibido información de que los antiguos miembros de Clear Sky podrían haber ocupado el laboratorio X-8 hace algún tiempo. Necesito que investigue el laboratorio y vea si puede recuperar los documentos que puedan haber dejado allí.
Excelente trabajo. Lo has hecho bien.
Freedom!
Lukash will introduce you to Freedom's way of life for a token sum of 15,000 RU.

Heh, and I guess you're looking for a sweet taste of Freedom, aren't you? Yeah, I can sort you out. Just ask yourself one thing - "Do I have what it takes to be a badass"? Because you gotta have stones bigger than Death Lamps to roll with us. We have lots of good times here, sure, but when shit hits the fan, you gotta be ready to help defend your brothers against fanatics, fascists, governments...\n \nWe fight for a Free Zone. If you're serious about helping us set up an Anarchist Utopia here, kindly set aside 15,000 RU for the boys, and I'll happily introduce you.

Buen trabajo. You're finally free. A word of warning, though - anyone who disrupts the freedom of my boys tends to wind up sleeping in the Bloodsucker Village. Remember to be considerate of others around here.
Freedom!
Lukash will introduce you to Freedom's way of life for a token sum of 15,000 RU.

Heh, and I guess you're looking for a sweet taste of Freedom, aren't you? Yeah, I can sort you out. Just ask yourself one thing - "Do I have what it takes to be a badass"? Because you gotta have stones bigger than Death Lamps to roll with us. We have lots of good times here, sure, but when shit hits the fan, you gotta be ready to help defend your brothers against fanatics, fascists, governments...\n \nWe fight for a Free Zone. If you're serious about helping us set up an Anarchist Utopia here, kindly set aside 15,000 RU for the boys, and I'll happily introduce you.

Buen trabajo. You're finally free. A word of warning, though - anyone who disrupts the freedom of my boys tends to wind up sleeping in the Bloodsucker Village. Remember to be considerate of others around here.
Destroy the Enemy Detachment
A detachment of stalkers has been causing problems for Freedom's friends. Lukash is offering a bounty to whoever takes these punks out.

Damn, these punks just won't settle down! Fine, we'll just have to teach them a lesson. Hey, stalker! Feel like helping Freedom for a reward? We've got some rascals who have been sneaking into our territory. They have been shooting at our friends and trying to gaslight my people. It's time to give them a lethal education on personal space. Can you do it?
Ah, great! Maybe we'll have some goddamn peace and quiet for once, eh?
Raid the Enemy
You have been tasked to raid enemy territory for Freedom. Informe a Lukash después de que el trabajo esté terminado.

I have an essential yet dangerous mission if you are willing. With Monolith to the north and Duty to the south, things are getting a little claustrophobic for my liking. I need a certified badass to raid an enemy camp and give us more breathing room. Do you dare to be that badass?
Ha! You actually did it, you mad man! Here, you've earned this, along with my respect.
Eliminate the Monolith Convert
A Freedom member has converted to the Monolith. Lukash has tasked you with finding and killing him.

I've got some real heavy news, man. One of our Freedom fighters have fallen under the influence of the Monolith. He was a good man, and I know he wouldn't have wanted to continue living as some alien crystal's brainwashed killer. Please, find him and take him down. Otherwise, his old friends are going to have to do it.
It's done? ¡Bueno! I know this was rough. Our brothers at the Barrier will drink to their fallen comrade. As for you, here's your payment.
Deal with the Problematic Stalker
Lukash will reward you for capping a troublesome stalker.
There's a fellow who's walking around not far from here. He shot one of ours down once. And something like that cannot be forgiven. Will you take the job to whack him? We'll pay, don't worry.
Hell yeah! That'll teach 'em to mess with us. Here's your reward, as I promised. Good job, stalker.
Bring Lukash a %s
Lukash has asked you to find a specific firearm in mint condition. Return to him when you find what he wants.

While Freedom's benefactors keep the lads supplied with the weaponry they need, I could really do with a new %s for personal reasons. If you happen to find one in excellent condition, I would be willing to give you a substantial payment for it.

While Freedom's benefactors keep the lads supplied with the weaponry they need, I could really do with a new %s for personal reasons. If you happen to find one in excellent condition, I would be willing to give you a substantial payment for it.
Bien hecho. This new shooter will make an enormous difference should the worst come to pass. Aquí está el pago que prometí.
Trigger Happy
Lukash is promoting aggression against some of Freedom's enemies. Bring back %s for a sweet bounty.

Well, right now, we're stuck in a hammer and anvil situation. Y'know, zealots to the north, extremists to the south, and sprinkle in some military goons for good measure. How about you explain to them what we think of their edicts and commands the old-fashioned way? There'll be a sweet reward at the end for you, don't worry.

Well, right now, we're stuck in a hammer and anvil situation. Y'know, zealots to the north, extremists to the south, and sprinkle in some military goons for good measure. How about you explain to them what we think of their edicts and commands the old-fashioned way? After you've finished humiliating their herds a bit, bring me %s as trophies. There'll be a sweet reward at the end for you, don't worry.
Hey, nice job, man. Here's your money.

Hey man. Here's a thing. Remember those Sin folks? They didn't get the memo the last time you kicked their collective asses, so I think it's high time for an encore. Loki said they've been spotted being unruly in Zaton, especially around the area of abandoned substation workshops. Go put them down.

Some of the newer stalkers among Freedom are starting to think you're the Second Coming of Rambo. That you keep coming back alive and well from jobs like this makes me think they may be onto something. So here. A little something for our Rambo.
Zoneraker
A Freedom spy needs to be extracted from an enemy faction. Kill the other members of the squad and escort him back to the base. The spy has an SVD.

One of my best men is currently hiding out among the enemy, trying to learn their secrets. He's usually a solid guy, so when he begins missing our contact times, I begin to worry. I have a hunch he's been ratted out, and that the squad he's with is now quietly waiting for the perfect opportunity to silence him permanently. We need to get him home. He left me a location ping, but he's with other stalkers. You need to take care of them and bring my man back in one piece. You will recognize him by his rifle, an SVD. He will have to shoot at you to maintain his deception when you attack the group, but he won't be aiming too well, so don't hold a grudge.
Fine work. Time to grease this guy's nuts for his knowledge.

Hey man, stop! I'm the Freedom spy! Sorry for taking potshots at you. I had to keep my cover just in case...luckily you made it. If you bring me to Army Warehouses safely, Lukash will reward you well. Lead the way, I'll follow!
Thanks for pulling my nuts out of the fire, stalker! See you around!
Why We Can't Have Nice Things
Destroy the vehicles at the Cordon checkpoint.

Do you have explosives? If so, I've got a big job for you. Right now, the military is bringing armoured vehicles into the Zone to reinforce their troops. I ask you, is this fair? Look at the rusty, dysfunctional pieces of junk we have rotting in our warehouses! If we can't have tanks that work in the Zone, then neither can the government! My spies say these vehicles are arriving to be stationed at the Cordon checkpoint as we speak. My mole also says he'll guarantee the vehicles are unmanned when you pay your visit, so you can destroy them without being turned into swiss cheese. You want in? Then pack your pineapples and get going!
Bring Wild Game for Freedom
Despelleja mutantes recién muertos para recolectar carne de caza. Then deliver %s to Skinflint for your reward.
Tengo el trabajo para ti, hombre, si no le temes a unos pocos mutantes. ¿Estás interesado?

So, some of the guys are planning a dinner party to celebrate Bob Marley's birthday. Better late than never, right? Anyways, the more meat we can get for the feast, the better - so if you are out and about, bring me enough %s, and I'll make it worth your while. Jah will never forget you!
Ah, this'll make for a fine meal once the chef gets his hands on it. Here's your payment. Why not buy some vodka and celebrate?
Deliver Locked Case to Skinflint
Skinflint tiene una entrega que debe recogerse.

One of our couriers was supposed to bring a package through today. They had to hide it somewhere safe when a Duty patrol caught wind of them, however. They sent me the stash coordinates before going invisible on the network, so if you're willing to walk on over and finish the job by fetching the goods, I'll give you a cut of their pay.
Let's take a look-see...ah yes. Just what we needed. Thank you stalker, here's your cut of the pay.
Phantoms in the Dark
Skinflint will pay you to cull a terrible mutant that haunts the Bloodsucker Village. Don't get caught napping.

Sleep has been a little harder around camp lately. Each night we hear screaming, but before we can do anything about it, yet another one of our men on the road gets swallowed by the darkness. We find their mangled remains strewn about the Bloodsucker Village the next day.
 
Lukash thinks a rare breed of bloodsucker may be in town. A darker, stronger, more vicious motherfucker that only comes out at night. A few of the vets think we should cease night hikes until it migrates and hopefully starts messing up Duty instead, believing it's too risky for us to go after it directly.
 
Well, I say if you've got the stones to wait for it in the Village after nightfall, I'd be thrilled to shower you in roubles for killing the bastard, and the rest of the lads around here will be grateful to get a good night's sleep again. Or at least as good as sleep gets this close to the Brain Scorcher.
Wow, you actually did it! You lunatic. I'll let the camp know the good news. Glad we have a hunter like you around.
Scarce Supplies
Skinflint needs %s to help keep Freedom's medic stocked.
Hey man. Some of our guys can get a bit too adventurous from time to time. We haven't got enough supplies to treat all of 'em.

Sí. You know how rough and tumble life can be in Freedom, right? Dodging bullets and fighting fanatics is just part of the daily life around here. As badass as it makes Freedom's fighters feel, it also means we're just a little short on meds. Since Solid is too high off his ass to manage his profession's logistics, that responsibility now falls to me. If you can help out by bringing in some %s, you'd have Freedom's gratitude. And, of course, some of my roubles.
Ah, brilliant. I'll make sure these stay out of Solid's sight until his patients need it. Thanks a lot, stalker.
Amass Artefact Hunting Equipment

Well, there is something important that needs looking at. Here's the thing: short of risking our luck in Belarus, there are precisely two scientific bunkers that Freedom can contact for anomaly-diving supplies. No more, no less. One is sandwiched between Duty thugs, military goons, and who knows what else. The other is a light jog away from Pripyat. And both...are sponsored by the very government we fight against. We need to start stockpiling new artefact hunting equipment NOW in case either of those places suddenly becomes cut off from our runners. I need you to begin gathering Bear detectors and artefact containers wholesale. I understand everything I'm requesting will take a while to obtain. Don't fret, your payment will be adequate. If you go the extra mile and get some batteries, you'll even get a bonus, too. So, you in?
Encuentra %s
%s son requeridos por Screw para instalar actualizaciones de equipos básicos, debe traerlos de vuelta a él si encuentra alguno.
Yo, hombre. ¿Estás interesado en hacer un trabajo para mí? Necesito herramientas específicas para operar armas.
Bien, necesito un %s. Te pagaré si me puedes devolver un juego.¡Gracias hombre!
Sabía que había una razón por la que te pregunté. Te ves como un hombre que puede hacer una mierda.
Encuentra %s
%s son requeridos por Screw para instalar actualizaciones avanzadas de equipos, debe devolverlos a él si encuentra alguno.
Jaja, odio preguntar. Pero realmente podría usar más herramientas. Me trajiste lo que te pedí la última vez, pero necesito un conjunto de mayor calidad. ¿Puedes ayudar de nuevo?
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas avanzadas. Debe contener lo que necesito. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Mantén esta mierda, todos por aquí te van a amar. Gracias hombre.
Encuentra %s
%s son requeridos por Screw para instalar actualizaciones de equipos expertos, debe devolvérselos si encuentra alguno.
Jaja, odio preguntar. Pero realmente podría usar más herramientas. Me trajiste lo que te pedí la última vez, pero necesito un conjunto de mayor calidad. ¿Puedes ayudar de nuevo?
Debe contener lo que necesito. Debe contener lo que necesito. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Mantén esta mierda, todos por aquí te van a amar. Gracias hombre.
To every friendly Stalker reading this, a large group of Monolith soldiers is approaching the Barrier, any help will be appreciated and rewarded.
Defend the Barrier
Freedom is asking for help to repel a Monolith attack.
Monolith? I'll pass...
Whoa, free money. Here I come!
I wasn't planning to go to the Army Warehouses any time soon anyway.
Rewarded how? Cash, artefacts, guns? I'm not going to drag my ass there for just some vodka.
Damn! I'm too far, I'd get there when it's all over already. Wanted to test my new rifle.
Killing Monolith? I'll do it for free, damn fuckers.
Can I keep what I find on the bodies?
I've heard your transmission, I have come to help defend the Barrier.

Excellent, the scouts reported several Monolith squads approaching and any extra gun is welcome. Get in position and wait for the fanatics to show up, simple right? If you feel it's becoming too much and decide to run we won't hold it on you but of course you can forget the reward.
The Barrier is safe.. for now at least.
Good shooting stalker, this should cover some of the lead you put in those bastards. And a little extra to relax. Glad we had you around!
The scouts say they're on the move right now, everybody get in position!
Oh damn, watch out! They got an RPG!
This ain't summer camp stalker. Be thankful there's people with more balls than you to keep your lot safe.
Good job brothers, and thanks to all the volunteers that didn't run away. Come back to me for your reward.
To every friendly Stalker reading this, a large group of zombies is approaching the Barrier, any help will be appreciated and rewarded.
Defend the Barrier
Freedom is asking for help to repel a zombie attack.
Poor things...
I'll pass, just doesn't feel right.
Well, at least it isn't Monolith.
This better be worth it, last time I spent more bullets than what I got in return.
Damn! I'm too far, I'd get there when it's all over already. Wanted to test my new rifle.
Zombies from the Radar? Damn... my friend went there just a few days ago.
Can I keep what I find on the bodies?
I've heard your transmission, I have come to help fighting the zombies.
Very well, usually they dont put up much of a fight but we are short on manpower thanks to Monolith and those pretend soldiers, it should be as easy as shooting at the range.
The horde is breaking through, everybody get in position!
Don't they ever end?
What is it, scared of things that can barely shoot back?
Good job brothers, finally they can rest in peace. Volunteers, come back to me for your reward.
They're all dead, for real now.

Very well, hope you didn't recognize anyone in there. Sometimes people come back from the Barrier more shaken up than when fighting Monolith. Let's have a drink at those poor souls, and something to help you not end up like them.
Hold on guys, we're coming to help!
We just departed from the base, we'll be there soon.
Is it that bad over there? I though you were enough!
It has already begun! Come on guys move your ass or we'll miss all the action!
Encuentra %s
%s is required by Solid to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily basis is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

You bet your sweet ass there is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain just the right cocktail of ingredients I need to make all sorts of drugs. For medicinal use, of course. I know the things some of the lads around here say about me. Don't listen to that bullshit. All I need is some decent kit, and I'll be able to get my little clinic over here into decent shape once again.
Great job! I owe you big time.
